duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform account reconciliations and analysis of multi-currency intercompany transactions.
Prepare company-wide consolidated financial statements and cash flows.
Prepare and maintain books and records for company divisions.
Assist and support the cost accounting functions, including preparation of labor and overhead updates.
Prepare and file various state tax returns, including sales and use tax.
Assist in preparation of audit support schedules.
Assist in preparation of the consolidated tax return.
Assist with internal audit travel assignments to international locations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting is required (CPA preferred)
